A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not agree at all that the last Jedi honor the Legacy. It show mainly the will of Disney to adapt it to its audience\, but not try to keep the legacy intact. The countless script holes\, the lack of epic breath\, bad character design to create twist for creating twists... At the end\, the universe seems left dull and empty. It has one credit however\, to make the first trilogy seems greats starwars movies now\, even with JarJar. How can you put 91% RT ?
